privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Volla collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as email address and payment information when you create an account. We also collect usage data including uploaded images (processed temporarily and not stored permanently), generated content, and platform preferences.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: Your data is used to provide and improve our services, process payments, communicate with you about your account, and ensure platform security. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

imageProcessing.title: Image Processing
imageProcessing.content: Images you upload are processed through AI systems (Google Gemini, Vertex AI) to generate optimized product photos. Uploaded images are processed in real-time and are not permanently stored on our servers. Generated images are stored in your account for your convenience.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and preferences. Analytics cookies help us understand how users interact with our platform. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance (EU Users)
gdpr.content: If you are in the European Union, you have rights under GDPR including: Right to access your personal data, Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to data portability, Right to object to processing. Contact us at privacy@volla.app to exercise these rights.

kvkk.title: KVKK Compliance (Turkey)
kvkk.content: Turkish users are protected under the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK). You have the right to learn whether your data is processed, request information about processing, request correction, request deletion, and object to automated decision-making.

ccpa.title: CCPA Compliance (California)
ccpa.content: California residents have the right to know what personal information is collected, request deletion, opt-out of sale of personal information, and non-discrimination for exercising rights.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.content: We use trusted third-party services including Google Cloud (AI processing), Stripe (payments), and Vercel (hosting). Each service has their own privacy policy and data protection measures.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption in transit and at rest, secure authentication, and regular security audits. However, no system is 100% secure.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Volla, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

aiDisclaimer.title: AI Technology Disclaimer
aiDisclaimer.content: Volla uses advanced AI technology including Google Gemini and Vertex AI for image generation and SEO optimization. Important notices: AI-generated content may contain errors or inaccuracies, Results may vary and are not guaranteed, AI models are continuously learning and outputs may change over time, You are responsible for reviewing and verifying all generated content before use, We do not guarantee specific sales results or marketplace performance.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You agree NOT to use Volla for: Generating nudity, explicit, or adult content, Creating harmful, illegal, or fraudulent content, Infringing on intellectual property rights, Generating content that promotes violence or hate, Any purpose that violates applicable laws.

contentPolicy.title: Content Policy & Safety
contentPolicy.content: Our AI systems include safety filters that automatically reject requests for: Nudity or sexually explicit content, Violence or gore, Hate speech or discrimination, Illegal activities, Impersonation of real individuals without consent. Attempts to bypass these filters may result in account termination.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: You retain ownership of images you upload. You grant Volla a license to process your images for service delivery. AI-generated images are licensed to you for commercial use. You are responsible for ensuring you have rights to upload images.

accountResponsibility.title: Account Responsibility
accountResponsibility.content: You are responsible for maintaining account security, all activity under your account, ensuring uploaded content does not violate third-party rights, and complying with marketplace terms (Etsy, Amazon, Shopify).

payments.title: Payments & Refunds
payments.content: Subscriptions are billed in advance. Credits do not expire within your subscription period. Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis. You may cancel your subscription at any time.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Volla is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our liability is limited to the amount you paid us in the past 12 months.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account for violation of these terms or for any other reason with or without notice. You may terminate your account at any time through settings.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at:
